title: New: Burning God Little – Sorry For I Gar (ft. Bendik)
body:
This Oslo based outfit creates some intriguing ethereal electronic pop vibes with **Sorry For I Gar**.

[**Burning God Little**](https://www.facebook.com/BurningGodLittle) gloriously stands next to names like **Yumi Zouma** or **Air France**, with their dreamy electronic pop aura surrounding **Bendik**‘s essential vocal harmony and a soft, disco groove cultivating an addictive rhythm that’s impossible to leave behind. Burning God Little are well and truly on your 2014 ‘Ones to Watch’ list.  
\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/136538542″ params=”auto\_play=false&hide\_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /\]
